bug.author: caisq
bug.summary: Bug: setting trainable property of tf.LayersModel doesn't set the trainable bit of tf.Variable
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h4>TensorFlow.js version</denchmark-h>
1.1.0 If you set the trainable property of a tf.LayersModel instance to false, all the weights of the model should be set to untrainable (trainable = False) (assuming they are originally trainable). That's not the current behavior though and it needs to be fixed.
